about_the_game:
Want to be a teacher?! Want to get the Teacher Certification?! Come to hell! All it takes is 100 layers of hell to get your Teacher Certification( possibly ), what are you waiting for!

"Even if you are prepared for your test, you may not be able to get Teacher Certification. But if you play the game, at least, you get Steam achievements. "-- Game producer

Main Content

  • More than 600 real questions of recent Chinese Teacher Certification Examination Subject 1 (Comprehensive quality ) and Subject 2 (Educational knowledge and ability)

  • "Exciting" response voice, answer multiple choice questions is no longer lonely

  • A variety of in-game items that change the answer experience

Tester Feedback

  • "Mom, I'm learning on Steam again" -- Anonymous tester

  • "The fart sound is real, don't ask me how I know it" - Tester and my friend Joshua

  • "With a few months to go before the Teacher Certification exam, will God bless me if I play this game called Teacher Certification Hell "-- a philosophy college student

  • "Why not use my drawing skull? "-- Keen part-time artist

  • "Mom, this screen is mocking me! ? ! "-- The naughty kid in the neighborhood

  • "I love this game!! "-- Game producer himself

  • " I testify that he was in a healthy state of mind when he made the game "-- FJSKFLDAJ

Producer's Words

I'm Hao, the producer of this game. The idea for this game came from the night before my last Teacher Certification exam. I was fighting monsters under the Golden Tree when my friend texted, "How's the Teacher Certification Test? ". I just went crazy...... Then immediately begin to print the admission ticket, take out the book, open the teaching app to start learning quickly. Then I thought, if the learning process had been a little more fun, or if I had been given achievements while studying, or at least if the learning process had happened on Steam, maybe I wouldn't have left it until the last minute? So I wrote down the idea. The next day, after the exam, I named the project "Teacher Certification Hell" and started making the game. I hope you like it ~, and wish it can help you to improve yourself, if you are interested in this topic.

About Me

Hello everyone, I'm Hao, an educator, lifelong learner and a game producer.

I'm working hard to make some serious game, and some educational games which could influence our life in the real world.

Well, I wish you all a happy study time ~

Oh, I mean, I wish you all a happy gaming time~

name: Teacher Certification Hell

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 /11
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Quad Core 2.0 (or higher)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 and higher
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: This producer wants you to study on Steam again!! This is a game about Teacher Certification Knowledge. Depending on your strategy (ability), choose the right item at the beginning, and then use the answer to break through each Layers! After 100 layers, waiting for you may be......
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
